definition: Molek (i.e. king), the chief deity of the Ammonites

translations.bg: Молек (т.е. цар), главното божество на амонитите
translations.de: Molek (d.h. König), die Hauptgottheit der Ammoniter
translations.el: Molek (δηλ. βασιλιάς), η κύρια θεότητα των Αμμωνιτών
translations.es: Molek (rey), divinidad principal de los amonitas
translations.fr: Molek (i.e. roi), divinité principale des Ammonites
translations.hu: Molek (azaz király), az ammoniták fő istensége
translations.id: Molek (yaitu raja), dewa utama bangsa Amon
translations.it: Molek (cioè re), la divinità principale degli Ammoniti
translations.ja: モレク（＝王）、アモン人の主神
translations.lt: Molekas (t. y. karalius), pagrindinė amonitų dievybė
translations.nl: Molek (d.w.z. koning), de oppergodheid van de Ammonieten
translations.pt: Molek (ou seja, rei), a divindade principal dos amonitas
translations.ro: Molek (i.e. rege), zeitatea principală a amoniților
translations.sk: Molek (t. j. kráľ), hlavné božstvo Amonitov
translations.zh: 摩勒克（即王），亚扪人的主神
